Sentencas: Iron-base scaling-resistant alloys (Fe-Cr) as materials for interconnectors of planar-type solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are proposed for application in automobile industry because of their advantages in comparison with other Ni- or Go-based alloys and ceramic materials (e.g. (La,Sr)CrO3).
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The oxidation kinetics of Fe-16Cr alloy (SUS 430) has been studied in H-2-H2O gas mixtures (p(H2)/p(H2O) = 94/6 and 97/3), and in air in the temperature range of 1023-1173 K for 3.6 up to 1080 ks, in the conditions simulating the anode and cathode environments in SOFC.
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It has been found that the oxide scale, composed mainly of Cr2O3, grows in accordance with the parabolic rate law.
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The dependence of the parabolic rate constant, k(p), on temperature can be described as k(p) = 6.8 x 10(-4) exp(-202.3
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: kJ mol(-1)/RT) for the H-2-H2O gas mixture with p(H2)/p(H2O) = 94/6.
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The determined parabolic rate constant is independent of the oxygen partial pressure in the experimental range of 5.2 x 10(-22) to 0.21 atm at 1073 K, which means that the growth rates of scale on Fe-16Cr alloy in the above-mentioned atmospheres are comparable.
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The increase in electrical resistance of the chromia scale growing on Fe-16Cr alloy vs, time, calculated from k(p) and the specific resistance of Cr2O3 scale, in comparison with the constant electrical resistance of a ceramic interconnector, made of (La,Sr)CrO3, indicates the necessity to modify the studied alloy surface.
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: At 1073 K, the resistance of the Fe-16Cr alloy coated with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3, by a spray-pyrolysis method is low, the average of 45 m Omega cm(2) in the H-2-H2O gas mixture (PH2/PH2O = 94/6) and the average of 20 m Omega cm(2) in air, in comparison with the ceramic interconnector, La0.85Sr0.15CrO3, 0.5 cm thick.
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This indicates the applicability of SUS 430 alloy as interconnector for SOFC.
Titulo: Application of Fe-16Cr ferritic alloy to interconnector for a solid oxide fuel cell
